title: LaviPlay - Movie App
short_desc: LaviPlay - Movie App A dynamic movie discovery app built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, allowing users to search movies from any year and create a personalized watchlist.

title: Tableau project
short_desc: A Tableau project showcasing a comprehensive analysis of coffee sales data. Explore insights into sales trends, market dynamics, and product performance with visually appealing coffee-themed dashboards.

title: Lavandula - Restaurant
short_desc: Lavandula is a stylish and responsive restaurant website built with React, Vite, TailwindCSS, HTML, and JavaScript. Designed to reflect the elegance of the restaurant
